overview: This is the hope of the snail clan, who devotes himself to daily practice with the teacher to fight the enemy. Ibu's mother Aibu was also the master of erotic surgery, and he also takes over his mother's blood and learns eroticism to protect the snail clan. One day, Ibu goes to the distant future through his crack, and Ibu spends the same day as Masato who met there. At the same time, the junior teacher feels that the snail village is on the verge of disappearing, and sends it back to the future. The junior is commanded by the teacher to protect the village with the erosul they have learned and spend the last night with Masato. She then returns to the past, pledging her next life.
title: Female Ninja Squirting Ninja Book
